content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetScopeRules path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/rules content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all edgerules

200

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination

type arr

type obj
props
id
type str
desc an edgerules unique identifier

type str
desc an edgerules name
slug
type str
desc a human and machine readable name for an edgerule
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an edgerule was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date an edgerule was last updated
desc a edgerule associated with a cdn site

edgerules can modify incoming http requests to a cdn site before theyre sent to the origin
desc the requested edgerules
desc the response from request to retrieve the edgerules on a cdn sites scope
